title: [bug] v2 file-drop doesn't trigger drop event listener in fs plugin

labels.name: status: needs triage
labels.description: This issue needs to triage, applied to new issues

body:
### Describe the bug

The fs plugin listens for a drop event to modify the fs scope. The event is fired by the listener never receives it.

### Reproduction

`cargo create-tauri-app --alpha`
`cargo add tauri-plugin-fs`
Insert `.plugin(tauri_plugin_fs::init())` before `.run` in `main.rs`.
Replace `main.js` with the following:
```js
const { getCurrent } = window.__TAURI__.window;
const { readDir } = window.__TAURI__.fs;
window.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
  getCurrent().onFileDropEvent(async (event) => {
    if (event.payload.type === "drop") {
      let entries = await readDir(event.payload.paths.paths[0], { recursive: true });
      console.debug("entries", entries);
    }
  });
});
```
`cargo tauri dev`

### Expected behavior

The event is received and the fs scope is adjusted to allow the path.
